Name: Sodium nitrate
Details: Added to processed meats to stop bacterial growth. Linked to cancer in humans.

Name: Sulfites
Details: Used to keep prepared foods fresh. Can cause breathing difficulties in those sensitive.

Name: Azodicarbonamide
Details: Used in bagels and buns. Can cause asthma.

Name: Potassium bromate
Details: Added to breads to increase volume. Linked to cancer in humans.

Name: Propyl gallate
Details: Added to fat-containing products. Linked to cancer in humans.

Name: BHA/BHT
Details: Fat preservatives, used to extend shelf life. Linked to cancerous tumor growth.

Name: Propylene glycol
Details: Used as antifreeze. Thickens dairy and salad dressing. Deemed 'generally' safe.

Name: Butane
Details: Put in chicken nuggets to keep them tasting fresh. A known carcinogen.

Name: Monosodium glutamate (MSG)
Details: Flavor enhancer linked to headaches, nerve damage, heart problems, seizures.

Name: Disodium inosinate
Details: Used in snack foods. Contains MSG.

Name: Disodium guanylate
Details: Used in snack foods. Contains MSG.

Name: Enriched flour
Details: Refined starch made from toxic ingredients.

Name: Recombinant Bovine Growth Hormone (rBGH)
Details: Used in cows. May cause cancer.

Name: Refined vegetable oil
Details: Soybean, corn, safflower, canola, peanut oils. High in omega-6 fats. May cause cancer.

Name: Benzoate
Details: Used as a preservative in salad dressing and soda. May cause cancer and DNA damage.

Name: Brominated vegetable oil
Details: Flavor oil in soda. Banned in some countries. Causes organ damage.

Name: Propyl gallate
Details: Used in meats, soup mixes. Causes cancer in rats. Banned in some countries.

Name: Olestra
Details: Unabsorbed fat-like substance. Causes digestive issues and heart concerns.

Name: Carrageenan
Details: Used in prepared foods. Can cause ulcers and cancer.

Name: Polysorbate 60
Details: Used in baked goods. Can cause cancer in lab animals.

Name: Camauba wax
Details: Used in chewing gum and candy. Can cause cancer and tumors.

Name: Magnesium sulphate
Details: Used in tofu. Can cause cancer in lab animals.

Name: Chlorine dioxide
Details: Used in bleaching flour. Can cause tumors and hyperactivity.

Name: Paraben
Details: Used to prevent mold. Can disrupt hormones and link to breast cancer.

Name: Sodium carboxymethyl cellulose
Details: Used in salad dressings. Cancer risk in high quantities.

Name: Aluminum
Details: Preservative in packaged foods. Can cause cancer.

Name: Saccharin
Details: Carcinogen linked to bladder cancer in rats.

Name: Aspartame
Details: Excitotoxin thought to be a carcinogen. Causes dizziness and stomach issues.

Name: High fructose corn syrup
Details: From GMO corn. Causes obesity, diabetes, heart problems.

Name: Acesulfame potassium
Details: Used in sodas and ice cream. Causes cancer in rats.

Name: Sucralose
Details: Splenda. Causes swelling in liver and kidneys.

Name: Agave nectar
Details: High in fructose. Linked to insulin resistance and liver disease.

Name: Bleached starch
Details: Used in dairy. Related to asthma and skin issues.

Name: Tert butylhydroquinone
Details: Used in fish products. Can cause stomach tumors.

Name: Red #40
Details: Petroleum-based. Linked to hyperactivity and cancer.

Name: Blue #1
Details: Used in candy/soda. Can damage chromosomes and cause cancer.

Name: Blue #2
Details: Used in candy/soda. Can cause brain tumors.

Name: Citrus red #2
Details: Used to color oranges. Causes cancer if peel is eaten.

Name: Green #3
Details: Used in candy. May cause bladder tumors.

Name: Yellow #5
Details: Used in desserts and baked goods. Linked to kidney tumors.

Name: Yellow #6
Details: Used in sausage and beverages. Linked to kidney tumors.

Name: Red #2
Details: May cause asthma and cancer.

Name: Red #3
Details: Used in desserts. Linked to nerve damage and thyroid cancer.

Name: Caramel coloring
Details: In sauces and bread. Can cause cancer in mice.

Name: Brown HT
Details: Used in packaged foods. Can cause cancer.

Name: Orange B
Details: Used in hot dog casings. Can cause asthma and cancer.

Name: Bixin
Details: Causes hyperactivity. Affects liver and bile duct.

Name: Norbixin
Details: Causes hyperactivity and asthma.

Name: Annatto
Details: Causes hyperactivity and asthma.
